title: With a Little Luck
description: Jude Barnett is determined to fly under the radar. He just wants to draw comics, design D&D campaigns for his friends, work at his parents’ vinyl record store, and escape high school as unscathed as possible. That is, until the night he finds himself inexplicably gifted with a bout of supernatural good luck.Suddenly, everything Jude has ever wanted is within reach. His art is being published. He helps his friend’s song get to the finals in a competition. And he wins a pair of coveted concert tickets, which he can use to ask out the popular girl he’s been crushing on since elementary school.But how long can Jude's good fortune last? And why does he find himself thinking about Ari, his best friend since forever?And if Jude has been dreaming of the wrong girl this whole time, does that mean he's doomed to be unlucky in love forever?
author: Marissa Meyer
